title: Deploy Mobile Camera Unit for Special Event
description: For a weekend festival, an operator needs to deploy a temporary, mobile camera trailer to monitor the event grounds.

tasks.description: Receive a request from the police department for temporary video surveillance at the 'Summer Fest' location.
Dispatch a public works crew to tow and set up the mobile camera trailer at the specified location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a work order for the deployment.

tasks.description: Once deployed, add the camera trailer's feeds to the main surveillance dashboard for monitoring.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully integrates the new camera feeds into the monitoring system.
